Package cryptoTrader.tradingManagement.trading

Class TradeListImpl

java.lang.Object
cryptoTrader.tradingManagement.trading.TradeListImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
TradeList
public class TradeListImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements TradeList
This class implements the TradeList class. Each Trade List has an instance and a list of all the trades performed

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static TradeListImpl getInstance​(java.util.List<Broker> brokerList, int iteration)
    Since this is a singleton class, there is only one instance allowed of TradeListImpl.
    java.util.List<Trade> getTradeHistory()
    Getter method retrieves the list of all past trades from all brokers

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static TradeListImpl getInstance​(java.util.List<Broker> brokerList, int iteration)
      Since this is a singleton class, there is only one instance allowed of TradeListImpl. This method checks if the instance is null, and if so, creates a new object of TradeListImpl.
      Returns:
      the instance of TradeListImpl

    • getTradeHistory

      public java.util.List<Trade> getTradeHistory()
      Getter method retrieves the list of all past trades from all brokers
      Specified by:
      getTradeHistory in interface TradeList
      Returns:
      a list of all past trades
